"Guiden": "This is Guiden. It seems you'll be facing more difficult battles from here on."
"I'm sending you some Special Ability Capsules that I think might help. Give them a try."
"That aside, do you feel ready for the coming battle? If you need to learn how to increase your Power Level, come and see me."
"Received C/Stamina II x20, C/Spirita II x20, C/Power II x40, C/Shoot II x40, C/Technique II x40."
